title: Response streaming with Amazon API Gateway Rest API and AWS Lambda
description: Creates an API Gateway REST API and Python Lambda function that provides a streaming response from the LLMs in Amazon Bedrock.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates how to use an Amazon API Gateway REST API with response streaming to a AWS Lambda Python function.

To enable response streaming with a Lambda Python function, we use [Lambda Web Adapter](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/compute/using-response-streaming-with-aws-lambda-web-adapter-to-optimize-performance/) and [Fast API](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-web-adapter/tree/main/examples/fastapi-response-streaming-zip).
